law.text:
As used in this chapter, unless the context requires otherwise:
"Secretary" means secretary of the Labor Cabinet; and
"Cabinet" means Labor Cabinet.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1699, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 123, sec. 32, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 414, sec. 8, effective July 13, 1984. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1599c-4.
